string.text: Clear Mutants Away from Skadovsk
Mutants are afoot. Hunt them down and clear the area.
Shh... Listen, hear that? Some mutants howling. Still gives me the chills after all this time. How about you go out there and take care of them? I'll make it worth your while.
Haha! Well done stalker! Have a drink on Beard!
Find the %s Artefact for Beard
Beard wants you to find the %s artefact for him.
None
I deal in artefacts. There is one in particular I would like to get my hands on, the %s. Do you want to try to get it for me? If you can find it I will pay you well.
Good hunting stalker! Have a drink on the house!
Skadovsk Search and Rescue
Monolith have captured a stalker. Find him and rescue him.
Stalker, Monolith bitches have captured one of our comrades. They headed off in that direction. Save him!
Haha! Look at the pair of you, hard to tell who lost the fight, haha! Come, come, drink up! Have some vodka and feel no more pain!
Defend Skadovsk
Monolith cultists are threatening the Skadovsk. Sneak up on their encampment and clear them out.
Those Monolith cultists have been creeping around Skadovsk again. One of the lookouts spotted a campfire not far from here, why don't you go check it out?
Ha! You got the bastards! Great job, have a drink!
Diplomat
Convince %s called %s to call off his search for a fellow stalker.

You see that guy in the corner there? Spetsnaz is looking for him. He's been hiding out here for weeks. They say he ran through the Brain Scorcher to escape them. I don't know how he survived, though he ain't quite right in the head anymore. Anyway, you want to help the poor fellow? I happen to know where the military commander who wants him is stationed. Maybe you can convince him to leave the guy alone.
Ah, you killed him! Well, that's effective diplomacy! Good man! Free drinks for you!
Retrieve PDA for Beard
Beard has a PDA stashed away that contains some dirt on Owl.

Haha! Look who it is! Well, my friend, have I got the deal for you! That prick Owl thinks he can shut me down, but I know a little something about him. There is a PDA I have stashed away that has everything I need to put him in his place. Bring it to me, stalker. I will make it worth your while.
Ha! You got it! Good man, stalker! Here, have a drink on me!
